hadiths.text: Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:None among you should prevent his neighbour from fixing a beam in his wall. Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) then said: What is this that I see you evading (this injunction of the Holy Prophet)? By Allah, I will certainly throw it between your shoulders (narrate this to you)

chapter.ara-name: باب غَرْزِ الْخَشَبِ فِي جِدَارِ الْجَارِ
chapter.eng-name: Fixing a piece of wood to a neighbor's wall
